description: Devold® Wool Fleece Bra is perfect for girls who are active outdoors when the weather is cold. To get the best of both worlds, Devold® has combined Merino wool with technical synthetic fibre. The bra dries quickly, has high insulation properties and good breathability, while feeling soft and comfortable on the skin. Devold® Wool Fleece Bra effectively wicks sweat away from the skin and keeps you warm.
name: Wool Fleece Bra
